      • calculateHeuristic

        public void calculateHeuristic(Node current,
                               Node finalNode)
        Calculates a heuristic from current to finalNode. The pattern may need updating depending on input. The heuristic may yield wrong results if not defined correctly.
        Parameters:
        current - Current node
        finalNode - Final node

      • checkifBetterPathExists

        public boolean checkifBetterPathExists(Node currentNode,
                                       Node neighbour,
                                       int cost)
        Checks if a better path exists between currentNode and neighbour, and if exists, updates neighbour's information.
        Parameters:
        currentNode - Current node
        neighbour - Neighbour node
        cost - Movement cost
        Returns:
        true if a better path exists, false otherwise
